description:
Your voice is one of your most powerful tools, yet most people have no idea how to harness the power of your voice.

*****Updated as of April, 2016*****

Voice coach, Jesai, and Podcast pioneer, Scott, bring you the authoritative course on empowering your communication and influence through the spoken word.

Jesai is recognized as one of the world's leading voice coaches. His acting and theatrical background brings you a unique perspective on how to utilize your voice more effectively.

When Scott first started travelling the world in 2003, captivating audiences from Times Square in New York to the Opera House in Sydney, Australia, from London, England to Los Angeles, Jesai was there coaching Scott to unleash the full power in his voice.

Practical and engaging, this course will teach you:

  • How to connect with your voice
  • Common mistakes to watch out for
  • How to feel and express the passion you have for your topic
  • Effective breathing exercises
  • How to use your voice to inspire your audience

Power Podcasters: Putting Your Best Voice Forward is designed to help you gently transform into the most dynamic speaker you can be. The human voice creates the most expressive sounds in the world and the truth is that we all have our own unique sound and presence. You will learn how to produce a powerful speaking voice that will resonate with your audience, bringing them back time and again for more.

This course teaches you to be more authentic and more 'you', bringing out the charisma we all have deep in our souls.

With this course, you receive:

  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

Enrol now!
title: Podcast Voice Training
